metadata.title: CVE-2019-17064 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.description: Catalog.cc in Xpdf 4.02 has a NULL pointer dereference because Catalog.pageLabels is initialized too late in the Catalog constructor.

notes.note: jdstrand> xpdf in koffice is 2.0 mdeslaur> poppler doesn't appear vulnerable to this issue ebarretto> xpdf in Debian uses poppler, which is not affected or fixed

criterions.comment: ipe package in kinetic is affected and may need fixing.
